data.text: Mgbe ahụ, Job zara sị:
“Anụla m ọtụtụ ihe dịka ndị a;
Ogologo okwu efu ndị a niile unu na-ekwu, ọ naghị akwụsị?
Mụ onwe m nwekwara ike ikwu okwu dịka unu,
Ma ọnụ m ga-agba unu ume;
“Ma ọ bụrụ na m ekwuo, adịghị egbochi ihe mgbu m,
Nʼezie o Chineke, i meela ka ike gwụ m,
I keela m agbụ; agbụ m abụrụla ihe akaebe megide m;
Chineke na-eweso m iwe, jiri iwe ya na-adọwasị m,
Ụmụ mmadụ na-asaghe ọnụ ka ha chịa m ọchị,
Chineke ewerela m nyefee nʼaka ndị ajọ omume,
Ihe na-agara m nke ọma, ma Chineke tipịara m.
ndị ọgba ụta ya agbaala m gburugburu.
Mgbe niile, ọ na-emegide m;
“Adụkọtala m akwa mkpe were ya kpuchie anụ ahụ m,
Ihu m na-acha ọbara ọbara site nʼakwa nke m na-akwa,
ma aka m emeghị ihe ike ọbụla,
“Ala, biko, ezokwala ọbara m;
Ọ bụladị ugbu a, onye akaebe m nọ nʼeluigwe,
Onye na-arịọrọ m arịrịọ bụ enyi m,
Nʼọnọdụ mmadụ ka ọ na-arịọ Chineke
“Naanị afọ ole na ole ga-agabiga
